thread.section_title: Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: AnitaT
thread.title_full: AnitaT - Review of Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Anita T
title: AnitaT
text:
Stayed in Taj 51 with my daughter. I'm blown away by this hotel . Exceptional. Stayed in a deluxe jnr suite, which we were upgraded to as it was my daughters birthday. Basically like a small luxurious apartment. Turn down service every evening, including pillow spray and chocolates.
Breakfast each morning was delicious. Buffet was very small but that didn't matter as we ordered from the extensive menu. Highly recommend the Italian eggs.
Happy hour each evening commenced at 6 pm and consisted of a large menu of drinks and delicious nibbles. All complimentary.
We ordered a movie one evening and which included popcorn and soft drinks again all complimentary.
The location was great. 5 minutes walks to Buckingham Palace. 15 minutes walk to the London Eye.
All the staff were fabulous.
A wonderful stay and we will definitely be back.
